price: Wala hauwafikii ukumbusho mpya kutoka kwa Arrahman ila wao hujitenga nao.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن ذِكۡرٖ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مُحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهُ مُعۡرِضِينَ
footnotes: Wala Mwenyezi Mungu hawaletei watu wako kwa ufunuo wake ya kuwakumbusha Dini ya Haki kuwa ni rehema kwao, ila wao huzua upya upinzani na ukafiri kuukataa. Kwani njia ya uwongofu imekwisha zibwa mbele yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min dhik'rin mina al-raḥmāni muḥ'dathin illā kānū ʿanhu muʿ'riḍīna
